1. Added Arabic version.
2. Sign up and captcha error solved.
3. Added more chat background options.
4. Fixed the email/mobile phone verification code error.
5. Fixed audio & video transfer error.
6. Improved message transfer speed.
7. Fixed message delivery failure issue.
8. Fixed other bugs.

1. Added Arabic version.
2. Sign up and captcha error solved.
3. Added more chat background options.
4. Fixed the email/mobile phone verification code error.
5. Fixed audio & video transfer error.
6. Improved message transfer speed.
7. Fixed message delivery failure issue.
8. Fixed other bugs.

1. Add more notification sound options.
2. Differentiate private and broadcast messages.
3. Increase the maximum number of broadcast chat to 1000.
4. Fix system error and timeout request error.
5. Fix other bugs.

1. Add more notification sound options.
2. Differentiate private and broadcast messages.
3. Increase the maximum number of broadcast chat to 1000.
4. Fix system error and timeout request error.
5. Fix other bugs.

1.New broadcast feature: Add "select all" to save your time to create a broadcast list. Broadcast messages will be received in the form of private messages.
2.Add a sign to differentiate broadcast and private messages.
3.Support 50 broadcast lists at most.
4.Add Delete in Broadcast list to remove members.
5.Fix image view error.
6.Improve message transfer speed.
7.Fix other bugs.

1.New broadcast feature: Add "select all" to save your time to create a broadcast list. Broadcast messages will be received in the form of private messages.
2.Add a sign to differentiate broadcast and private messages.
3.Support 50 broadcast lists at most.
4.Add Delete in Broadcast list to remove members.
5.Fix image view error.
6.Improve message transfer speed.
7.Fix other bugs.

1.Add timed messages, supporting text and image.
2.Add a loading sign for voice messages.
3.Improve message loading speed for part phone models.
4.Share photos from album to BAT.
5.Fix some errors to prevent crashes.

1.Add timed messages, supporting text and image.
2.Add a loading sign for voice messages.
3.Improve message loading speed for part phone models.
4.Share photos from album to BAT.
5.Fix some errors to prevent crashes.

2.Show percentage progress while sending or receiving images.
3.Fixed a bug that users can't receive messages when there is too much data.
4.System stability optimization.
